description: A program that defines some basic values.
grammar:
target ::= ":" "T[0-9]+" "=" expr

expr ::= "let" "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*" target ";" expr
       | base

base ::= "~" "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*" base
       | "@"

description: A program that defines a function that takes a list and returns its length.
grammar:
expr ::= "fix" "(" expr ")"
       | base argchain
       | "let" "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*" target ";" expr
       | base

base ::= "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*"
       | function
       | argchain
       | "~" "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*" base
       | "@"

function ::= "case" pattern "=>" expr
           | "case" pattern "=>" expr function

basepat ::= "@"
          | "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*"
          | "~" "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*" basepat
          | "(" pattern ")"

pattern ::= basepat
          | basepat "," pattern

target ::= ":" "T[0-9]+" "=" expr

argchain ::= "(" expr ")"

description: A program that defines a function that takes a boolean and a list and returns its length or the list paired with its length.
grammar:
expr ::= "fix" "(" expr ")"
       | base argchain
       | "let" "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*" target ";" expr
       | "if" expr "then" expr "else" expr
       | base
       | base "," expr

base ::= "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*"
       | function
       | argchain
       | "~" "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*" base
       | "@"

function ::= "case" pattern "=>" expr
           | "case" pattern "=>" expr function

basepat ::= "@"
          | "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*"
          | "~" "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*" basepat
          | "(" pattern ")"

pattern ::= basepat
          | basepat "," pattern

argchain ::= "(" expr ")" argchain
           | "(" expr ")"

target ::= ":" "T[0-9]+" "=" expr

description: A program that defines construction of a pair by calling two different functions on the same input.
grammar:
base ::= "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*"
       | function
       | argchain
       | "@"

function ::= "case" pattern "=>" expr

basepat ::= "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*"
          | recpat
          | "(" pattern ")"

expr ::= "let" "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*" target ";" expr
       | base
       | base "," expr

recpat ::= "_." "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*" "=" pattern

pattern ::= basepat

argchain ::= "(" expr ")" argchain
           | "(" expr ")"

target ::= ":" "T[0-9]+" "=" expr

expr ::= "fix" "(" expr ")"
       | base argchain
       | "let" "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*" target ";" expr
       | base
       | base "," expr

base ::= "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*"
       | function
       | argchain
       | "~" "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*" base
       | "@"

function ::= "case" pattern "=>" expr
           | "case" pattern "=>" expr function

basepat ::= "@"
          | "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*"
          | "~" "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*" basepat
          | "(" pattern ")"

pattern ::= basepat
          | basepat "," pattern

target ::= ":" "T[0-9]+" "=" expr

argchain ::= "(" expr ")"

description: A program that defines less-than-or-equal of two numbers and maximum of two numbers.
grammar:
expr ::= "fix" "(" expr ")"
       | base argchain
       | "let" "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*" target ";" expr
       | "if" expr "then" expr "else" expr
       | base
       | base "," expr

base ::= "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*"
       | function
       | argchain
       | "~" "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*" base
       | "@"

function ::= "case" pattern "=>" expr
           | "case" pattern "=>" expr function

basepat ::= "@"
          | "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*"
          | "~" "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*" basepat
          | "(" pattern ")"

pattern ::= basepat
          | basepat "," pattern

argchain ::= "(" expr ")" argchain
           | "(" expr ")"

target ::= ":" "T[0-9]+" "=" expr

description: A program that defines addition and multiplication.
grammar:
expr ::= "fix" "(" expr ")"
       | base argchain
       | "let" "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*" target ";" expr
       | base
       | base "," expr

base ::= "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*"
       | function
       | argchain
       | "~" "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*" base
       | "@"

function ::= "case" pattern "=>" expr
           | "case" pattern "=>" expr function

basepat ::= "@"
          | "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*"
          | "~" "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*" basepat
          | "(" pattern ")"

pattern ::= basepat
          | basepat "," pattern

argchain ::= "(" expr ")" argchain
           | "(" expr ")"

target ::= ":" "T[0-9]+" "=" expr

description: A program that defines addition, summation from left, and summation from right.
grammar:
expr ::= "fix" "(" expr ")"
       | base argchain
       | "let" "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*" target ";" expr
       | base
       | base "," expr

base ::= "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*"
       | function
       | argchain
       | "~" "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*" base
       | "@"

function ::= "case" pattern "=>" expr
           | "case" pattern "=>" expr function

basepat ::= "@"
          | "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*"
          | "~" "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*" basepat
          | "(" pattern ")"

pattern ::= basepat
          | basepat "," pattern

argchain ::= "(" expr ")" argchain
           | "(" expr ")"

target ::= ":" "T[0-9]+" "=" expr

description: A program that defines the fibonacci sequence.
grammar:
expr ::= "fix" "(" expr ")"
       | base argchain
       | "let" "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*" target ";" expr
       | base
       | base "," expr

base ::= "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*"
       | function
       | argchain
       | "~" "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*" base
       | "@"

function ::= "case" pattern "=>" expr
           | "case" pattern "=>" expr function

basepat ::= "@"
          | "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*"
          | "~" "[a-zA-Z][_a-zA-Z]*" basepat
          | "(" pattern ")"

pattern ::= basepat
          | basepat "," pattern

argchain ::= "(" expr ")" argchain
           | "(" expr ")"

target ::= ":" "T[0-9]+" "=" expr
